participant_1.background:
I'm proud to have a happy and healthy relationship with my partner.
I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army.
I prefer to walk to places, whether I'm going for a walk with my dog or running errands.
i can play piano.
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.

participant_2.background:
I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace.
i am an avid fan of the boston celtics.
i like to listen to rap music.
i am in grad school.
i love to bake.

content.text: Hello! I am really sad because my brother is leaving for the army soon. It is a good opportunity for him, but it is hard to say goodbye.
I am sorry to hear that. I am sure he will do great things in the army.
Thank you, I am trying to be positive about it.
Is there anything you can do to take your mind off of things?
I have been spending a lot of time with my partner and dog. I also like to play piano.
That sounds nice. I like to spend time in my garden and bake.
I love baking too! I have been trying to dye my hair blue, but I have not quite gotten it right yet.
That sounds really cool! I would love to see a picture if you ever get it right.
I will try! I am in grad school right now for computer science.
That is awesome! I am sure you will do great things.
Thank you! I am trying to learn as much as I can.
That is great! It sounds like you are on the right track.
